did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Revolution and the Development of International Relations Project Records,

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Revolution and the Development of International Relations Project

did.abstract: Memoranda, correspondence, data sheets, and printed matter, relating to the comparative study of social, political, and economic development in various countries during the twentieth century, and especially to the comparative study of political and military elites in various countries.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Revolution and the Development of International Relations Project Records, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.
